item.title: Web Scraper | Python
item.description: For the Golang version please check here. Well, everyone else is using python. So I played around with Golang now I’m switching to Python. """ create a rss class to parse the rss feed url anf get the title and link """ import feedparser import os class rss: def __init__(req, url): req.url = url def fetchDetails(req): try: url = req.url last_etag = '' last_modified = '' title = '' link = '' row = '' result = [] feed = feedparser.
